tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My 14 year old daughter was treated by Dr. Rao at Remedy Hospital, Kukatpally. He was very thorough and straightforward in his approach. Most importantly, we found him very competent and, a man of high integrity. The medications and investigations were all appropriate. His explanation was also clear and precise.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: couple weeks later after i met with an accident, I felt uneasy and week frequently. he analyzed all past reports, and suggested me to consult neuro physician once again and come back.  ********* ** ********** unlike all other doctors he did not prescribed unwanted tests and medicine. very prompt . very much satisfied.

He is not patient friendly. He does not try to understand the feelings of the patient. A doctor's way of speaking to the patient is more important than treating itself. A doctor should instil confidence in the patient that nothing will hamper his recovery. Prescribing tests and based on the reports, prescribing medicines **** * **** without proper interaction with the patient ** *** *** ************** ** ** ********* ******* **** ** **** ***** ** ************* *** ** Therefore,  I don't want to  recommend his name to any of my friends.

************** ******* ** ** ******* ****** ****** *** ************. He doesnt even have the interest in listening to the patients symptoms. Chose him because of his experience, but these are the reason why people are showing interest in self- treatment.
Critical cases not able to handle, if critical cases goes at this covid time dead body will be handed over to us
Very nice doctor with good explanation of issues and no additional medicines recommended, he suggested to continue with same medicines
